full_text:
1 
his assistant answered, but it's really, it's him, if you're talking to 
say, to his assistant
4 DETECTIVE: //Sarah, you're talking about Sarah.
6 //you're talking to him. Yeah, I'm talking about Sarah specifically.
8 DETECTIVE: Sarah and Nada are not the same people.
10 No, Nadia is um some other chick, she's like his girlfriend or 
whatever you want to call it, and then is one of his 
girlfriends also, I, I know her and then Sarah. And Sarah she's like 
his main assistant, like his official assistant who really does his 
assistant work.
16 DETECTIVE: Who travels with him.
18 Who travels with him and stuff like that. He has other girls that he 
calls assistants but they just screw him. That's it. Um. I don't 
know. I'm, I'm sorry, I like go off on a tangent and I completely 
forget what the original thing was.
23 DETECTIVE: Um. We were talking about if you ever flew in the plane, or have 
you recently talked to
26 DETECTIVE 2: //UI
28 Oh, I'm sorry I was talking about the emails, I hate when I do that, 
I apologize.
31 DETECTIVE: No, that's all right.
33 Um, uh, he answered me with 'That's really unfortunate, blah blah 
blah, well if you need any help with school, any costs, tuition, 
books, anything like that, just let me know.' Um, so I wrote back 
and I just asked, um, I said [cell phone interference] and UI, you 
know, from him wrote accounting negotiation and basic law, like I 
remember that [laughs], he wrote those and um. He again 
reminded me that if I wanted anything, any like if I needed any 
financial help or anything like that, that he would set it up, he 
would help me out. No problem. And I haven't, I haven't 
contacted either of them since. And that was probably four or six 
weeks ago, I don't really remember specifically, it was after I 
moved here. But not after I talked to the other
46 DETECTIVE: //You haven't had any phone conversations with him,
Defense Transcript
07/26/17                Page 2372                October 11, 2005 PBPD &
Public Records Request No. 11 200
DOJ-OGR-00032685
